comment.author: 35367807@N02
comment._content: My mother Carroll Babcock of Sag Harbor, NY married into the Smyth family. Her three Babcock brothers, Paul, Ben and Lyman worked on parts of the LEM when they all worked at Grumman in Sag Harbor and Bethpage, NY. People in the village of Sag Harbor, NY still remember working on this project . I wonder if this crater was near where the LEM landed. Sueasterix.
